content: Hello, I have a newbie question. I have a key assumption which I want to use to "rewrite" my goal. However, if I understood well, rw do not have access to bind variables. How can I do that ? Thank you!
Normally simp_rw, but that doesn't work if you need the i \in range d hypothesis
In this case, I'd apply Finset.sum_congr rfl first, and see if you can take it from there
Thank you very much it worked like a charm!!
Gaëtan Serré has marked this topic as resolved.
